Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
Author: kenziekenzie
Title: black stanley
Body: mine came with random white marks but when you wash the cup it comes right off. if your new to stanleys i recommend the 30oz. the 30oz it really big. good cup overall. mine came with what seems like some white residue on the lid & it wont really come off. you cant really see it but close up you can. the insulation is great. appearance is pretty good but it u get the black stanley you wont be able to see the stanley logo unless your close up. and lastly portability is amazing!

Title: Ice cubes are gone within hours...
Body: I thought something was off about my "Stanley" when my husband had an iced drink in his TJ Maxx stainless steel cup & I had the same iced drink in my new Stanley. A few hours had passed & he still had chunks of ice cubes in this cup & the ones in my Stanley had melted down. I'm confused? Maybe it's a fake? Either way very dissapointed

Author: Bruce
Title: Great Mug
Body: A lot of people complain that this mug leaks. Well, it does. However, it doesn't say it is leak-proof, just splash proof. It does what it says, keeps hot hot and cold cold. Doesn't splash in the car and saves me money on buying $5 coffee.
